name: Light Maze (itch)
description:
A game for the Discord Jam #1 , where you find your way through a dark maze towards the light.

Controls:
Movement: Mouse
Interacting: Mouse
Looking: Mouse
Eating: Not mouse since you can't eat but if you could it would be mouse

Disclaimer: This is my second project for the jam, as the previous one was scrapped after finally realizing that it wasn't working out.
In other words, this game was made within 5 hours... Enjoy!
